composite_beam_cross_section_two_materia.description: Cross-sectional diagram showing composite beam made of two materials (Mat A and Mat B) with hatching patterns indicating different material properties

coordinate_system_cross_section.png.description: Coordinate system diagram showing y-axis vertical and x-axis horizontal with cross-sectional area representation

beam_transformation_pcvw_method.png.description: Beam transformation diagram showing system A with fixed support and point load P converting to system B with reaction force X, illustrating PCVW method application

cantilever_beam_displacement.png.description: Simple cantilever beam diagram with fixed support on left and vertical displacement indicator on right

simply_supported_beam_point_load_analysi.description: Simply supported beam with point load P at distance 'a' from left support, showing coordinate system, moment diagrams, and internal force representations at different sections

beam_variable_stiffness_two_sections.png.description: Beam with two different stiffnesses (EJ₁ and EJ₂) with point load P, showing transformation to equivalent system with reaction X

distributed_load_pattern.png.description: Distributed load diagram showing linearly varying load with arrows pointing downward and annotation indicating stress distribution

cantilever_beam_local_effects.png.description: Cantilever beam with point load P showing local effects annotation

beam_element_internal_forces_3d.png.description: 3D beam element diagram showing internal forces and moments (Tx, Ty, Tz, Mx, My, Mz) with coordinate system and sign conventions for zy-plane and zx-plane

beam_element_distributed_loads.png.description: Beam element diagrams showing distributed loads and internal force increments in zy-plane and zx-plane, plus distributed twisting moment representation

cantilever_beam_linear_distributed_load_.description: Cantilever beam with linearly distributed load showing two cases (A and B) with coordinate systems and load distribution patterns

beam_case_b_internal_actions.png.description: Case B analysis showing reaction forces, internal actions diagram with shear force Ty and moment Mx at beam cross-section

beam_internal_force_distribution_results.description: Beam diagrams showing internal force distributions and moment patterns with numerical values involving q₀, ℓ parameters
